name: Clumsy Adventure
description:
Sinopsis We find ourselves in a post pandemic futuristic world where "human labor" jobs such as waiters, paddlers, laborers, etc. have been completely taken over by robotic labor. The game is set in a Irish local pub in a city in the 1st day after the pandemic, where people gather for the first time after years, all crazy to get together. It's the little robot's job to make sure everyone can finally enjoy a San Miguel. Game Jam This game has been made for the Beer Jam - San Miguel which lasted 3 days.   Theme: Finally together with a San Miguel Developers Alex Andreu - Art  Ryan Palazón - Game Designer, Lead Level Designer, Programmer Arnau Sauch - Audio  Marc Romera - Lead Programmer & Level Designer Controls

Move: W, A, S, D

Jump: Space
